Package org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.site

This package contains Vaadin Site Kit core implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocalizationProvider
    Provider interface for localizing strings.
    SecurityProvider
    Security Provider interface for accessing user and role information.
    SiteView
    Interface for site views.
    Viewlet
    Interface for viewlets.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSiteUI
    Abstract base class for UI which need to track page requests and be able to get currently active window.
    AbstractSiteView
    Abstract base class for site view implementations.
    AbstractViewlet
    Abstract base class for Viewlet implementations.
    FixedWidthView
    Fixed width implementation of PageWindow.
    LocalizationProviderBundleImpl
    LocalizationProvider implementation which loads localized values from resource bundle in classpath.
    NavigationDescriptor
    NavigationDescriptor information class.
    NavigationVersion
    The navigation version.
    SecurityProviderSessionImpl
    Security provider session implementation.
    Site
    Vaadin portal implementation.
    SiteContext
    The session context containing application specific objects with UI life time.
    SiteDescriptor
    The site collects pages and navigation together.
    ViewDescriptor
    SiteView descriptor class.
    ViewletDescriptor
    Viewlet descriptor.
    ViewVersion
    The view version.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SiteMode
    Site modes enabling showing different page versions based on mode.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SiteException
    Exception class for Site related exceptions.

Package org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.site Description

This package contains Vaadin Site Kit core implementation.
Author:
Tommi S. E. Laukkanen
